content: Patient billing record for Ezra Mendoza (DOB 09/22/2016) shows recurring telebehavioral health claims for ASD and comorbid anxiety. Recent claim #HL21-9872B was denied due to out-of-network provider status (Dr. Chen's practice). Parent contacted member services on 04/15/2024 regarding appeal options and potential grandfathering clauses under the new mental health parity rules.
